column4: Does anyone know how to get a USB mouse working on Ubuntu? My Microsoft 1020 USB mouse isn't working at all on my laptop :(
i usually just plug it in and they start working right away
yeah thats what people say, but that isnt the case with me :(
is this the only usb mouse you've tried?
do you have any other usb devices to plug into it?
my USB ext HD works fine
yeah this is the only mouse Ive tried
is it a laser mouse? does it work on any other computer?
it has worked on a window computer, and its optical so yes :)
and do you get any messages in syslog when you plug it in?
open a terminal and type:  tail -f /var/log/syslog   while you're doing that, unplug/plug the mouse in and wait a few seconds
if you do get anything, you can always pastebin it
eeek, target? you don't have anything else around?
i'd get it there - they have a better return policy :)
